response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product for $11,000. This price reflects a strategic balance between maximizing my return on investment and ensuring that you receive a valuable asset at a reasonable cost. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to facilitate this transaction.", "product_price": 11000}
